item.title: 荷兰推出 5000 万欧元基金以聘用顶尖研究人员
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）继续大刀阔斧削减联邦政府资助的科研经费之际，荷兰宣布设立一项5000万欧元（5850万美元）的基金，以吸引国际顶尖研究人员。【原文：The Netherlands has announced a €50 million ($58.5 million) fund to lure top international researchers as US President Donald Trump continues to make sweeping cuts to federally funded science and research.】

item.title: 摩根大通考虑削减中国和印度在新兴市场债券指数中的份额
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）正在考虑削减其旗舰新兴市场指数（包括中国和印度）中最大债券发行商的权重，以反映更广泛的发展中国家债务。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is considering cutting the weight of the largest bond issuers in its flagship emerging-market index — including China and India — as it seeks to reflect a broader range of developing-nation debt.】

item.title: 高盛与皇家贝蒂斯合作为足球场融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）正在制定一项计划，准备举债筹集高达 2.5 亿欧元（约合 2.92 亿美元）的资金，用于西班牙皇家贝蒂斯足球俱乐部（Real Betis Balompie SAD）体育场的翻新工程。【原文：Goldman Sachs is working on a plan to raise as much as €250 million ($292 million) in debt to fund the refurbishing of Spanish football club Real Betis Balompie SAD’s stadium, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华为在中东和东南亚寻找人工智能芯片客户
item.description: 华为技术有限公司正试图向中东和东南亚出口小批量人工智能芯片，试图在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）主导的市场站稳脚跟，尽管制造方面仍面临挑战。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. is trying to export small quantities of AI chips to the Middle East and Southeast Asia, an effort to establish a foothold in markets dominated by Nvidia Corp. despite ongoing manufacturing challenges.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆称现在了解关税对通胀的影响为时尚早
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，他认为通胀有上行风险，但现在就知道关税是否会对物价产生持续影响还为时过早。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he sees upside risks to inflation, but it’s too early to know whether tariffs will have a persistent impact on prices.】

item.title: 加拿大第一大港寻求建造商增加 70% 的吞吐能力以推动亚洲贸易发展
item.description: 温哥华港是加拿大通往亚洲的主要贸易门户，在加拿大寻求减少对美国经济依赖的过程中，温哥华港开始寻找一家公司建造一个新码头，以处理多 70% 的货物。【原文：The Port of Vancouver, Canada’s main trade gateway to Asia, kicked off the search for a company to build a new wharf to handle 70% more cargo, as the country looks for ways reduce economic reliance on the US.】

item.title: 市场欢呼紧缩计划，罗马尼亚急于填补预算缺口
item.description: 在罗马尼亚政府利用国际市场进行了一次超额认购的硬通货交易后的第二天，罗马尼亚利用投资者情绪好转的机会出售了比计划更多的国内债务。【原文：Romania sold more domestic debt than planned, taking advantage of improved investor sentiment a day after the government tapped international markets in a heavily oversubscribed hard-currency transaction.】

item.title: 前花旗集团投资组合经理加入罕见的 10 亿美元启动俱乐部
item.description: 一位曾在肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的对冲基金巨头 Citadel 公司负责管理资金的投资组合经理正准备推出一只新的宏观基金，他加入了拥有 10 亿美元或更多资金的独立经理人的稀有行列。【原文：A portfolio manager who used to run money at Ken Griffin’s hedge fund behemoth Citadel is preparing to launch a new macro fund, joining a rare breed of independent managers starting out with $1 billion or more.】

item.title: 美国夏季旅游开始，加拿大人驾车出行减少 33
item.description: 加拿大人致力于放弃美国旅行，今年上半年前往美国的自驾游次数至少是 2017 年以来（不包括大流行病）最少的。【原文：Canadians are committed to ditching US travel, taking the fewest number of car trips there in the year’s first half since at least 2017, excluding the pandemic.】

item.title: 交易员透过混乱看公司业绩，股市保持稳定
item.description: 美国股市周四开盘时在小幅上涨和下跌之间摇摆，投资者分析了一系列关税头条新闻，并展望了下周即将开始的公司业绩。【原文：US equities swung between small gains and losses at the open Thursday as investors parsed through a slew of tariff headlines and looked ahead to corporate results that are due to start in the earnest next week.】

item.title: 英国将向欧洲星链竞争者欧洲通信卫星公司投资 1.63 亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）在欧洲的竞争对手，该公司表示，英国政府将投资 1.633 亿欧元（1.91 亿美元），加入上个月由法国主导的对该公司的投资。【原文：Eutelsat Communications SA, the European competitor to Elon Musk’s Starlink, said that the UK government will invest €163.3 million ($191 million), joining a France-led round into the company last month.】

item.title: 阿根廷就美国法官要求其放弃 YPF 股份的命令提起上诉
item.description: 美国法官要求南美国家在下周之前交出其在能源公司 YPF SA 的控股权，以帮助履行一项价值 160 亿美元的判决，阿根廷对此判决提出上诉。【原文：Argentina filed notice that it was appealing a US judge’s ruling requiring the South American nation to hand over its controlling stake in energy company YPF SA by next week to help satisfy a $16 billion judgment.】

item.title: 德国克林拜尔敦促联合信贷银行放弃对德国商业银行的追求
item.description: 德国呼吁意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 放弃对德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的追逐，因为这家意大利银行通过将衍生品转换为股票的方式将其股权增加了一倍。【原文：Germany called on UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel to abandon his pursuit of Commerzbank AG, after the Italian bank doubled its equity stake by converting derivatives into shares.】

item.title: 意大利费列罗公司同意以 31 亿美元收购凯洛格公司
item.description: 费列罗国际公司（Ferrero International SA）同意以 31 亿美元的企业价值收购 WK 凯洛格公司（WK Kellogg Co.【原文：Ferrero International SA agreed to acquire WK Kellogg Co. for an enterprise value of $3.1 billion, pushing the Italian family-owned candy business further into the lucrative US market.】

item.title: 莱昂纳多在政治压力下斥资 16 亿欧元收购依维柯防务部门
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）对依维柯集团（Iveco Group NV）的防务部门提出了最低收购价，因为政治压力迫使该业务继续掌握在意大利人手中。【原文：Leonardo SpA made the lowest offer for Iveco Group NV’s defense unit amid political pressure to keep the business in Italian hands, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: CoreWeave 冷却的股价反弹面临更大障碍
item.description: CoreWeave 公司（CoreWeave Inc.【原文：CoreWeave Inc.’s blistering rally has lost steam as the artificial intelligence infrastructure play faces a growing tangle of bearish catalysts that threaten to further unravel its meteoric rise.】

item.title: 人工智能生成的虐待儿童网页激增 400%，令监督机构感到震惊
item.description: 根据英国非营利组织互联网观察基金会（Internet Watch Foundation）的最新数据，利用人工智能工具制作的儿童性虐待图像报告在 2025 年上半年激增了 400%。【原文：Reports of child sexual abuse imagery created using artificial intelligence tools have surged 400% in the first half of 2025 according to new data from the UK-based nonprofit Internet Watch Foundation.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数在七月四日假期期间连续四周下降
item.description: 在包括独立日假期在内的这段时间里，美国失业救济金申请连续第四周下降，降至两个月以来的最低点。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell for a fourth week to the lowest in two months during a period that included the Independence Day holiday.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收 50%关税，巴西资产下跌，前景堪忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁要对来自南美国家的所有商品征收 50%的关税，这在市场上引起了轩然大波，巴西资产随之下跌。【原文：Brazilian assets dropped as President Donald Trump’s threat to impose 50% tariffs on all goods from the South American nation rippled through markets.】

item.title: 欧盟市场监督机构就加密货币监管问题批评马耳他
item.description: 欧洲市场监管机构批评了马耳他的加密货币监管工作，该机构今年已向几家大型交易所发放了许可证，但在与其授权的一家身份不明的实体有关的几个方面存在不足。【原文：Europe’s markets regulator criticized crypto oversight in Malta, which has granted licenses to several large exchanges this year, for falling short in several areas related to an unidentified entity it authorized.】

item.title: 高盛警告美元可能很快再次像风险货币一样交易
item.description: 最近几周，美元的波动可能已经平息，但高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US dollar volatility may have settled down in recent weeks, but analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. see plenty of reasons to think it may start trading as a “riskier” currency again.】

item.title: 巴西通胀率上升，连续六个月未达目标
item.description: 巴西的年度通胀率进一步超过目标，这预示着巴西央行在开始放松过高的利率之前还有很长的路要走。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation ticked up further above target, a signal of the long road ahead before the central bank can begin easing sky-high interest rates.】

item.title: 太阳能发电量创历史新高，法国电价出现负增长
item.description: 周四，法国成千上万块太阳能电池板的发电量创下新纪录，由于电网充斥着廉价电力，发电价格跌破零。【原文：France’s power generation from thousands of solar panels hit a fresh record on Thursday, sending prices below zero as the grid gets flooded with cheap electricity.】

item.title: 五角大楼投资稀土磁铁生产商支持新建工厂
item.description: 稀土磁铁生产商 MP Materials 公司获得了美国国防部 4 亿美元的股权投资，用于建设一座新工厂，摩根大通公司和高盛集团也承诺提供 10 亿美元的融资。股价飙升。【原文：Rare earth magnet producer MP Materials Corp. secured a $400 million equity investment from the US Department of Defense to build a new plant, with a $1 billion financing commitment from JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. The shares soared.】

item.title: 彭斯指责特朗普转向 "永久性 "关税壁垒
item.description: 前副总统迈克-彭斯批评唐纳德-特朗普的关税议程，称这是与其第一任期截然不同的贸易方式，将损害美国消费者和企业。【原文：Former Vice President Mike Pence criticized Donald Trump’s tariff agenda, saying it was a starkly different approach to trade from his first term that would harm American consumers and businesses.】

item.title: 投票前抢购美元未能提振阿根廷比索
item.description: 由于大豆出口商在出售收获的大豆后兑换了创纪录的美元，比索交易商本以为阿根廷货币会走强。但事实恰恰相反：比索兑美元汇率自 4 月份以来一直走低，现在又下跌了 4%。【原文：Peso traders were expecting the Argentine currency to strengthen as soybean exporters exchanged record amounts of dollars after selling their harvest. Instead, the opposite happened: The peso, which has been weakening against the US currency since April, slid another 4%.】

item.title: 台湾人寿保险公司因新规定而利润增加
item.description: 台湾最大的保险公司在监管机构出台新规定，允许公司动用额外储备金来抵消本币收益带来的亏空之后，于 6 月份实现了盈利。【原文：Taiwan’s biggest insurers posted profits in June after the regulator rolled out new rules to allow companies to access extra reserves to offset shortfalls from gains in the local currency.】

item.title: 即使在特朗普征收关税之前，铜的成本也在攀升
item.description:
由于买家在征税前囤货，纽约期货价格较伦敦价格大幅升水。【原文：

New York futures have been trading at significant premiums to London prices as buyers stock up before the levies.

】

item.title: 欧佩克+讨论在下次增产后暂停增产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的代表透露，欧佩克+正在讨论在下一次月度增产后，从 10 月份起暂停进一步增产。【原文：OPEC+ is discussing a pause in further production increases from October after its next monthly hike, according to delegates familiar with the matter.】
